staging.title: This is Staging!
staging.description: All changes on this domain get thrown away at athe end of the day (around 3:00 AM).

localhost.title: This is localhost!
localhost.description: The app is connected to a locally running back-end.

troubleshooting.title: Report an issue
troubleshooting.contactUs:
Did you discover a problem? 
You can send a report about what happened.
troubleshooting.sendTo: Please send us this report to <1>kafe@fi.muni.cz</1>, thank you!
troubleshooting.mailContents:
Good morning,

I experienced the following problem while using KAFE:
{{message}}

I am attaching the generated report

Thank you and have a nice day

---
troubleshooting.selectAttachments: We would appreciate as much detail as possible about the problem. However, you can choose what information you provide us:
troubleshooting.page: The page where the problem occurred
troubleshooting.user: The account that had a problem
troubleshooting.description: Please describe in as much detail as possible what went wrong:

createProject.title: Create a new project in the project group

error.projectDoesNotExist: Project with the given ID does not exist
error.subtitle: We are terribly sorry for the inconvenience. If you feel like this was not supposed to happen (which it probably wasn't), please send us the report bellow
error.title: Whops, something went wrong

temp.after2: If you did not receive the email, you can request it again.
